nodes.text: G0-ON Abductor was a battle droid model used by Nocturno and Drake Raven, a pair of gladiators in the Arena Grand of Zakuul. Along with G0-ON Attackers, these droids assisted them during the fights. In 3630 BBY Nocturno and Drake were put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger", who defeated them along with their G0-ON Abductor in the seventh round of the Arena fights.
G0-ON Abductor appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as part of the seventh boss fight of the "Eternal Championship".
